Hi,
  I am trying to test a web applivation usin SSL. Unfortunately, the 
server sertifivate is not setup properly and it pops up a message 
asking the client to accept or reject the certificate. My pronlem is: 
how can I get that message and respond to it using HttpUnit and Junit 
so my test continues execution.

Any ideas?!
